focus: Scaling LLM coordination, deterministic agentic systems, anti-hallucination infrastructure
hero_project: SCIS v4.0 — Summary & Coordination Intelligence System
ProgramAnalyzer — Deterministic Multi-Agent Code Mapping Engine (SCIS-Aligned)
why_this_portfolio_stands_out: Introduces SCIS v4.0 as the first public, map-first framework for reproducible LLM-assisted dev, and ProgramAnalyzer for safe, zero-AI code mapping. Proven on 300+ file projects over 18+ months with no hallucinations.
core_innovation: ProgramAnalyzer — Deterministic Code Intelligence Without LLMs
scis_v4_key_features: Flat file structure (no folders, universal naming like 'A#p#s#f#.ext')
Multimodal support (code, docs, diagrams in unified format)
proof_points: Powers tools like PaintBuilder and Quantum Signal Sim
other_high_signal_projects: Enterprise JS crypto suite (AESCipher to ChaosIntelligence)
Quantum Signal Simulator with archival phases
for_recruiters: Seeking staff/principal roles in Autonomous Agents, LLM Infra, AI Platforms, or Applied Research to scale SCIS v4.0.
contact: Via X (@MrTrentDaVinci), GitHub Issues; open to relocation.
